response: Our Tiers: FREE (₹0/mo) for paper-trading. PRO (₹5,000/mo) for live automation. ELITE (₹15,000/mo) for dedicated infrastructure and high-frequency limits.
Risk controls are mandatory. You must set a Daily Loss Limit (₹) and Max Trades Per Day. If these limits are breached, the system halts execution immediately to protect capital.
We verify broker sessions continuously. You can connect Zerodha (Kite) or Fyers via the Dashboard. Ensure your API tokens are valid; expired tokens will disable live trading.
All accounts default to Sandbox (Paper) mode. To trade with real money, you must request 'Live Access' via the broker modal and receive Admin Approval. Live mode carries financial risk.
Strategies run server-side on our VPS. Signals are generated based on technical models (Trend Follower, Mean Reversion). You can subscribe to specific strategies in the Automation tab.
Aegis System Online. I can assist with Platform Configuration, Risk Parameters, and Execution Status. How may I direct you?
The Emergency Panic Button (Admin Only) immediately halts all kernel operations, cancels open orders, and flattens positions. This action is logged and requires manual reset.
User Tiers enforce strict limits: FREE (View Only), BASIC (1 Lot, Nifty Only), PRO (Unlimited, All Instruments, 1% Risk), ELITE (Custom Quotas, Priority).
SaaS Governance ensures strict isolation. No command reaches the Execution OS without passing Authentication, RBAC Permissions, Billing Quotas, and Risk Checks.

Aegis OS v2 employs a strict 'Observer-Executor' boundary. The SaaS layer is a read-only Observer that requests actions. The Core OS is the Executor and holds final authority to reject requests based on Safety Checks.
Aegis SaaS never touches your funds. We simply route signals to your connected broker (Zerodha/Fyers). All execution happens in your own broker account.
